author: Joshua Gilbert
comment: Great watch face but the 6 is cut off on the moto 360 2nd gen

reply.content: Thanks! The cut off is intentional on devices with 'shelf' at the bottom, as the overall concept is to take advantage of the full circle. Nevertheless, the positions of the numbers may be reviewed for the upcoming releases.
